mapper.insert: insert into REPORTBOARD ( reportId, title, content, writerId, writerName, writerPw, status, assigned, fileOriginalName, fileSavedName, fileMimeType, fileSize, email ) values ( reportId_seq.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, #{writerId}, #{writerName}, #{writerPw}, '대기중', #{assigned, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileOriginalName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSavedName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileMimeType, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileSize, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{email} )
